text: A previous conviction of the defendant, or any tenant or owner of the property, shall not be required to demonstrate a drug-, firearm-, or prostitution-related nuisance.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-3306.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 16-81 substituted "drug or prostitution-related" for "drug-related".

D.C. Law 18-259 substituted "drug-, firearm-, or prostitution-related" for "drug or prostitution-related".
